author: Camelot
title: The Slow Drip Drip Drip Of Benghazi Fraud Revealed
text: The Slow Drip Drip Drip Of Benghazi Fraud Revealed Yet another Republican admits what we all knew all along. Time for a Special Prosecutor. Quote: Second GOP Congressman Admits Benghazi Committee Is All About Hillary Clinton (UPDATE) A second congressman admitted on Wednesday that the Republican House committee created to investigate the 2012 terrorist attack in Benghazi, Libya, is solely "designed to go after" Hillary Clinton. This may not be politically correct, but I think that there was a big part of this investigation that was designed to go after people and an individual, Hillary Clinton, Rep. Richard Hanna (R-N.Y.) said on WIBX First News with Keeler in the Morning, a radio show in upstate New York. Republicans say they formed the House Select Committee on Benghazi to investigate the attack. Democrats have complained that the committee, which has cost taxpayers about $4.5 million during its 17 months of existence, was primarily a political stunt. Thanks from skews13 and Lyzza
